thread.title: Bella Hadid's face says it all as she struts past ex The Weeknd at H&M show in Paris
thread.title_full: Bella Hadid's face says it all as she struts past ex The Weeknd at H&M show in Paris

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Bella Hadid's face says it all as she struts past ex The Weeknd at H&M show in Paris
text:
Bella Hadid's face says it all as she struts past ex The Weeknd at H&M show in Paris The model gave her sister a cheeky look as she walked past her ex-boyfriend Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Watch this video again Video will play in Bella gets support from Gigi as she runs into ex The Weeknd at H&M show Share this video Get   
Bella Hadid made no secret of the fact she wasn't particularly happy that ex-boyfriend The Weeknd moved on with Selena Gomez. 
So, any post-split encounter was always going to be a little awkward. 
On Wednesday, the model and her 21-year-old sister Gigi Hadid walked the runway for H&M in Paris. 
In a video taken by Fashion Editor Nikki Ogunnaike , the 20-year-old and Gigi strutted past the Canadian star hand-in-hand as they made their final walk down the runway with the rest of the models. 
And just as she passed her ex, Bella gave a very telling look at her sister Gigi, who returned the gesture with her own knowing glance. (Photo: Instagram/nikkiogun) The Weeknd performs during the H&M Studio show in Paris (Photo: Splash News) 
Selena, who has joined new boyfriend The Weeknd, 27, in the City of Love, was reportedly not at the show. 
However, on Monday night the lovebirds were spotted together leaving La Reserve Hotel, which isn't far from the hotel Bella was staying at on the same night. The models prep for the catwalk show (Photo: Getty Images Europe) Bella and Gigi backstage at the H&M show (Photo: Getty Images Europe) The Weeknd performs as ex Bella struts her stuff (Photo: Splash News) 
Meanwhile, it's been rumoured that Bella was seen "getting flirty" with a mystery man in London last week. 
According to the New York Post's Page Six column , Bella got close with a photographer at the LOVE X Burberry Fashion Week bash in the capital. 
An insider told the newspaper that the stunning model - who has also walked for the likes of Balmain and Tommy Hilfiger - and her new acquaintance appeared were "whispering to each other at various points throughout the evening". Like us on Facebook
